name: TeleluciogenicsVR
description:
Teleluciogenics VR

!!IF YOU WANT TO SUPPORT CONTENT LIKE THIS. PLEASE DONATE!!!

Experience synesthetic audio/visuals and sophisticated TV-Throwing mechanics.
Plays with OpenVR compatible headsets and controllers

Controls:

  • Right joystick:  Forward  thrusters Move forward / Backwards
  • Left joystick: Side thrusters, rotate
  • Grab TV's with trigger button, and release to throw.
